# Pacotes


```{r warning=FALSE, message=FALSE}
library(pliman)
set_wd_here("figs/capsulas")
img <- image_import("00a9b780-f098-44c5-aca7-5c77501e18a8.jpg")

```

# Contagem manual
```{r}
pick_count(img)

```



# Analisar as fotos


```{r}
img2 <- image_resize(img, rel_size = 50)
res <- 
  analyze_objects(
    img2,
    index = "GRAY",
    marker = "point",
    opening = 10
  )

plot(img2)
text(x = res$results$x, y = res$results$y -25, labels = round(res$results$area, 2), col = "red")
```



# Processamento em lote
```{r}
res <- 
  analyze_objects(
    pattern = "-",
    dir_original = "figs/capsulas",
    dir_processed = "figs/capsulas/proc",
    index = "GRAY",
    marker = "point",
    opening = 10
  )
```
